# WAN 2.2 Video Generation

## Models
- Text-to-Video: NSFW-API/NSFW_Wan_14b
- Image-to-Video: Wan-AI/Wan2.2-I2V-A14B

## Usage
Send POST request to endpoint with:
- `prompt`: Text description
- `image_url`: (Optional) For image-to-video mode
- `resolution`: '480p', '720p', or '1080p'
- `num_frames`: 81-100 frames
- `guidance_scale`: 3-5 recommended for WAN 2.2

## Hardware Required
- A100 80GB GPU minimum
- 100GB storage for models
